com.gams.platforms

Class BasePlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gams.GamsJNI
      • com.gams.platforms.BasePlatform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlatformInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebuggerPlatform

    public abstract class BasePlatform
extends GamsJNI
implements PlatformInterface
    Base class that should be extended when creating a Java platform for usage in the GAMS controller

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(BaseController controller)
        Initialize the platform with controller variables. Use this method to synchronize user-defined platforms with the controller.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that will be running the platform loop

      • assume

        public void assume(long cptr)
        Facade for the protected setCPtr method in GamsJNI
        Parameters:
        cptr - the C pointer for the underlying class
